post.title: Architects @ TechEd
post.content: My team owns the architect track for TechEd 2004. We’re hoping to build on the very successful Architecture Symposium from PDC. As part of that effort, I own that community efforts for the architect track. I’m working on the plan now. Obviously, we’ll have “the usual” events: Ask the Experts, Birds of a Feather, Speaker Lounge, Attendee Party, etc. Any other suggestions? Please email me or leave a comment.
